summary: Frina the Follower. She probably won't be very helpful on the battlefield. She is most skilled at distracting the enemy with her curvy figure.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b][color=blue]Support the authors[/color][/b][/size]
[size=5][b]If you like this mod and the assets used then please support the authors by installing and endorsing the mods below

[/b][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18530]Skyrim SE version now available[/url]
[/size]
[b]ABOUT THIS MOD[/b]
Frina the Follower. She probably won't be very helpful on the battlefield. She is most skilled at distracting the enemy with her curvy figure.

[b]Race: [/b]Imperial
[b]Class:[/b] Citizen
[b]Weapons: [/b]Ebony Sword, Ebony Bow
[b]Marry her:[/b] Yes
[b]Location:[/b] Whiterun The Bannered Mare

[b]INSPIRATION FOR THIS MOD[/b]
Inspired by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2719378]Handicraft[/url] 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/images/703813]Click here to view image[/url]﻿
This was the original look I was going for but it turned out like this
